Package ca.corefacility.gview.data.readers

Provides for classes used to read in the data to display on the GView map.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FileFormatReader Defines an interface for reading in/extracting data and style for specific file formats.
 

Class Summary
AbstractFileFormatReader  
CGViewTabReader FileFormatReader for reading in cgview tab delimited files.
GenbankDNAFormatReader Reads in Genbank formatted files.
GFF3Reader  
GViewFileData Defines a class which can store the GView data that is extracted from a file.
GViewFileReader A factory to create GViewFileReaders from the passed input file.
 

Exception Summary
GViewDataParseException An exception thrown when there is a parsing error for the genome data.
 

Package ca.corefacility.gview.data.readers Description

Provides for classes used to read in the data to display on the GView map. Use GViewFileReader to read in the data, which will return a GViewFileData object with the data (and possibly the style if reading in a CGView xml file).
